creator: Ryan.Lubke@Sun.COM
text:
Below is an exception generated when parsing an XML document that has external
entities that can't be resolved:

-------------------------------------------------------------------
 javax.servlet.jsp.JspException:
 ///opt/projects/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/build/bin/xfiles/resolve.xml
       at
 org.apache.taglibs.standard.tag.common.xml.ParseSupport.doEndTag(ParseSupport.java:181)
       at
 org.apache.jsp.positiveParseSystemIdTest$jsp._jspService(positiveParseSystemIdTest$jsp.java:
-------------------------------------------------------------------

Greatly improved error handling for all unresolved entities, for both <x:parse>
and <x:transform>.  Messages are now along the lines of:

javax.servlet.ServletException: Could not resolve entity reference: "nope/inclu
ded.xml"

for the English locale.
creator: bayern@essentially.net
